definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The amount of electrolyte leakage was highly related to the treating time and concentration of toxin.

sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 为了消除肠胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或电解质液体。

sentences.english: In the simplest chemicing cell the electrolyte is the most efficient of sulfuric air conditioning unitidity in wdinedr.

sentences.english: Disclosed is an electrolytic cell for removal of material from a solution.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种从溶液去除物质的电解池。

sentences.english: The electrolyser circuit is protected by a 30-amp circuit breaker.
sentences.chinese: 该电解槽的电路是被一个30安培的断路器。

sentences.english: The effect of electrolyte on high frequency electrical property of wet tantalum capacitors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电解质对高频液体钽电容器电性能的影响。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is feasible to directly electrolytic produce low-titanium aluminium alloys in practice.
sentences.chinese: 因此电解法生产低钛铝合金在实际上也是可行的。

sentences.english: Hydrogen gas can be produced by the electrolysis of ordinary water.
sentences.chinese: 通过电解普通水可以制取氢气。

sentences.english: A study was made of the effect of cathode material and various operating conditions on the elec- troboc reduchon of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 研究了阴极材料及工艺条件对葡萄糖电解还原的影响。

sentences.english: This paper worked on the pre-electrolysis process in silicon electrorefining.
sentences.chinese: 电解质的预电解净化是该方法成功的基础。

sentences.english: Porous alumina was prepared by anodization in oxalic acid electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 在草酸电解液中，用阳极氧化法制备了多孔氧化铝。

sentences.english: The development situation of new techniques for metal anode cells in our company is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍公司近几年金属阳极电解槽技术开发进展情况。

sentences.english: In batteries, charged particles travel through electrolytes.
sentences.chinese: 在电池里，带电粒子穿过电解液。

sentences.english: The synthesis and application of cationic polyelectrolyte with high density charge.
sentences.chinese: 高密度电荷阳离子聚电解质的制备及应用。

sentences.english: Electrode selection for oxidation of cerium by cation ion-exchange membran electrolysis in sulfuric acid solution was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 报导了硫酸介质中电解氧化铈的阴阳极选择。
